mainBoard.flavorText: Tawnos won fame as Urza's greatest assistant. After he created these warriors, Urza ended his apprenticeship, promoting him directly to the rank of master.
mainBoard.name: Clay Statue

mainBoard.flavorText: "The bolts of our ballistae smashed into the monstrous thing, but our hopes died in our chests as its gears continued turning." —Sevti Mukul, *The Fall of Alsoor*
mainBoard.name: Diabolic Machine

foreignData.name: Dunkler Sog
foreignData.text: Für jedes {B} das Du zusätzlich zu den Beschwörungskosten ausgibst, fügt der Dunkle Sog seinem Ziel -das kann sowohl Spieler als auch Kreatur seineinen Schadenspunkt zu. Sodann bekommst Du für jeden so angerichteten Schadenspunkt 1 Lebenspunkt dazu. Du kannst allerdings nicht mehr Lebenspunkte gewinnen als die Kreatur Widerstandskraft bzw. der Spieler Lebenspunkte besitzt.

mainBoard.name: Drain Life
mainBoard.originalText: Drain Life does 1 damage to a single target for each {B} spent in addition to the casting cost. Caster gains 1 life for each damage inflicted. If you drain life from a creature, you cannot gain more life than the creature's current toughness.

rulings.text: Cost reducers can be used to reduce the X part of the mana cost.
You may gain up to the total toughness of the creature even if it was already damaged.

mainBoard.text:
Spend only black mana on X.
Drain Life deals X damage to any target. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more life than the player's life total before the damage was dealt, the planeswalker's loyalty before the damage was dealt, or the creature's toughness.

mainBoard.flavorText: Bones scattered around us joined to form misshapen bodies. We struck at them repeatedly—they fell, but soon formed again, with the same mocking look on their faceless skulls.
mainBoard.name: Drudge Skeletons
mainBoard.text: {B}: Regenerate this creature. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it.)

mainBoard.flavorText: "There is no calamity greater than lavish desires./ There is no greater guilt than discontentment./ And there is no greater disaster than greed." —*Tao Tê Ching 46*
mainBoard.name: Greed
mainBoard.originalText: {B} Draw an extra card and lose 2 life. Effects that prevent or redirect damage may not be used to counter this loss of life.

foreignData.name: Nevinyrrals Wunderscheibe
foreignData.text:
Kommt bereits getappt ins Spiel.
1, {T}: Zerstöre alle Kreaturen, Verzauberungen und Artefakte im Spiel einschließlich der Wunderscheibe selbst.

mainBoard.name: Nevinyrral's Disk
mainBoard.originalText: {1}: Destroys all creatures, enchantments, and artifacts in play, including Disk itself. Disk begins tapped but can be untapped as usual.

rulings.text: You don't sacrifice Nevinyrral's Disk to activate its ability. It's destroyed as part of the ability's resolution if it's still on the battlefield. If an effect gives Nevinyrral's Disk indestructible or regenerates it, it stays on the battlefield.

mainBoard.text:
This artifact enters tapped.
{1}, {T}: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.

foreignData.name: Leichenfledderer
foreignData.text:
Lege am Ende jedes Zuges für jede Kreatur, die in diesem Zug vernichtet wurde, eine Leichen-Spielmarke auf den Ghoul.
0: Entferne eine Leichenmarke, um den Ghoul zu regenerieren.

mainBoard.name: Scavenging Ghoul
mainBoard.originalText: At the end of each turn, put one counter on Ghoul for each other creature that was placed in the graveyard during the turn. If Ghoul takes lethal damage, you may use a counter to regenerate it; counters remain until used.

rulings.text: The Ghoul still gets to claim counters even if it enters after the creatures died.

mainBoard.text:
At the beginning of each end step, put a corpse counter on this creature for each creature that died this turn.
Remove a corpse counter from this creature: Regenerate this creature.

mainBoard.name: Swamp
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {B} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.name: Swamp
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {B} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.name: Swamp
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {B} to your mana pool.

foreignData.name: Knochenthron
foreignData.text: {1}: Jeder erfolgreich gesprochene schwarze Zauberspruch gibt Dir 1 Lebenspunkt. Du kannst diese Eigenschaft sofort oder später während des Zuges anwenden, aber nur einmal pro schwarzem Zauberspruch.

mainBoard.name: Throne of Bone
mainBoard.originalText: {1}: Any black spell cast gives you 1 life. Can only give 1 life each time a black spell is cast.
mainBoard.text: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

mainBoard.flavorText: The Wall of Bone is said to be an aspect of the Great Wall in Hel, where the bones of all sinners wait for Ragnarok, when Hela will call them forth for the final battle.
mainBoard.name: Wall of Bone
mainBoard.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{B}: Regenerate this creature. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it.)

mainBoard.flavorText: "About, about in reel and rout The death-fires danced at night; The water, like a witch's oils, Burnt green, and blue and white." —Samuel Coleridge, "The Rime of the Ancient Mariner"
mainBoard.name: Will-o'-the-Wisp
mainBoard.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{B}: Regenerate this creature. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it.)

foreignData.name: Düsternis
foreignData.text: Das Sprechen weißer Zaubersprüche verteuert sich um 3 Mana. Weiße Verzauberungen mit Aktivierungskosten werden ebenfalls um 3 Mana teurer.

sideBoard.name: Gloom
sideBoard.originalText: White spells cost 3 more mana to cast. White enchantments with activation costs require 3 more mana to use.

rulings.text: The additional mana is paid at the same time the spell/ability is cast/activated.
The extra mana is not considered part of the activation cost. It is a separate cost.
The extra mana is part of the total cost, so cost reducers can be applied to this cost.
Activated abilities contain a colon. They're generally written "[Cost]: [Effect]." Some keywords are activated abilities and will have colons in their reminder text.

sideBoard.text:
White spells cost {3} more to cast.
Activated abilities of white enchantments cost {3} more to activate.
